title: Barber Shop Beauty Salon Standard Windless Swooper Flag with Kit
features: Includes 1 standard sized flag with Kit
Sewn sleeve slips easily over the flagpole for easy set up
Highly visible and great for advertising outside of your business
Available in a variety of styles
description: This wonderful vibrant standard sized flag is perfect for bringing attention to your business. The dimensions are 30" by 138". It's rich in color, made up of 100% polyester knit, and durable for any type of weather conditions and will fly in the slightest amounts of wind. Pole and mount are included.
